entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:45 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 11:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -41.4°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:03 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:03 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:03 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 31. Forecast issued 6:03 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
